name: pnp-sp-dev-spfx-web-parts-react-teams-my-webinars
title: Teams My Webinars Web Part
shortDescription: Displays a list of Teams Webinars you are an organizer of, allows you to sync those webinars to a SharePoint list, to share within a Team and cross check pending registrants against membership of a team.
longDescription: Displays a list of Teams Webinars you are an organizer of, allows you to sync those webinars to a SharePoint list, to share within a Team and cross check pending registrants against membership of a team.

references.name: Build your first SharePoint client-side web part
references.description: Client-side web parts are client-side components that run in the context of a SharePoint page. Client-side web parts can be deployed to SharePoint environments that support the SharePoint Framework. You can also use modern JavaScript web frameworks, tools, and libraries to build them.
